name: Fruity Tower
description:
They ridiculed you, excluded you for years. "Not a fruit" they said. But enough is enough, it's time to show them what you're made of.

Your mission: Infiltrate the registered corporate office of Fruitiness Inc. guns blazing. Act out your revenge layer for layer until you get to the fruit in power and claim its seat as the fruitiest of all fruit.

Notice the conveniently placed balcony on every layer, which lets you jump out unharmed to recharge. If you use it strategically you can make the most out of every attempt, but if you don't, you'll have to pay the price.


Because of the jam deadline some features are missing and the game only goes up to level 30. Expect a full release some time after the jam.

No fruit was harmed in the making of this game
